Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1982...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1984, off Dan Petry (PHI)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 5/21/1984...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/1984, off Dan Spillner (LA)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Houston on 7/13/1984...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1984, hitting .295 with 6 HR, 68 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 8/9/1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/26/1986...
Had 6 hits with 7 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/10/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1987, hitting .353 with 6 HR, 23 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 7/13/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1987, hitting .563 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1987, hitting .370 with 4 HR, 27 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1987, hitting .340 with 23 HR, 133 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Cincinnati on 4/11/1988...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (N) on 6/2/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/6/1990 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1990, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Houston on 8/9/1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1991, hitting .483 with 1 HR, 12 RBI...
Injured on 9/14/1991 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Los Angeles on 4/19/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1992, hitting .615 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1992, hitting .379 with 3 HR, 21 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Francisco on 6/14/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1992, hitting .609 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 1/31/1994 (Going to NYM: P L. Aquino, SS T. Gwynn Sr., CF K. Puckett, P J. Franco. Going to CHC: 1B R. Ibanez, C M. Lieberthal, P S. Reynolds)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1994, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/7/1994, off Jose Mesa (SF)...
Injured on 10/2/1994 with a Bruised Cheekbone, out for 2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/5/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1995, hitting .577 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
